document.full_text: even with the nfl in lockout mode, the taxpayers in erie county, n.y., still have to keep paying the buffalo bills for their stadium expense ...
document.title: in nfl lockout, new york taxpayers set to pay bills for stadium
lines_and_colors: even with the nfl in lockout mode, the taxpayers in erie county, n.y., still have to keep paying the buffalo bills for their stadium expense ...
